title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 23
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 23
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Forestar Group (FOR). Forestar Group Inc.'s shares rose to their highest price since 2014 as a bidding battle for the homebuilder intensified. D.R. Horton Inc. raised its offer for a 75 percent stake in Forestar by $1.50 a share, to $17.75. The move followed two increases this week by another suitor, Starwood Capital, which wants to buy all of the company's stock. Starwood is now offering $16 a share under a deal that Forestar accepted in April.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
